name: 疯狂开锁-小游戏联盟
description:
"Crazy Unlock" is one-touch casual game about popping the lock.
You can simply play the game with only one finger.
Are you ready to play "Crazy Unlock"?

How To Play:
- Tap anywhere on the screen to start.
- Waiting for the red line to cross the little yellow circle
- Tap exactly when it crosses.
- Don't miss it and don't tap too fast.
- Hit the little yellow circle and the lock will pop.

Features:
- Simple concept that anyone can grasp!
- Many levels which you can challenge yourself
